name: AI_MainTask_BuildHouse
documentation:
When given condition is true, a blueprint for give house is set.

*Note*: Needs a human near target area.

*WARNING*: May take up to 30 seconds to actually place the blueprint.

parameters.name: ConditionId
parameters.documentation: Command is only active if the condition is true.

parameters.name: ExtensionLevel
parameters.documentation: Specifies the extension level of the building. E.g. `1` for level 2 viking tower.
